content: In constant currency, Electronic Components sales were up nearly 9% sequentially and up over 31% year-over-year, reaching $6.3 billion in the quarter. In the first quarter, our sales were $6.8 billion, up 21% year-over-year, well exceeding the top end of our guidance range. We continue to maintain discipline around expenses in the quarter as adjusted operating expenses were $475 million for the quarter, down 4% sequentially and down 1% year-over-year. Adjusted operating income of $293 million increased 64% year-over-year and grew 3 times greater than sales, demonstrating our ability to continue to drive operating leverage as we grow our business. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question.
